description: Detects suspicious outbound network activity via kerberos default port indicating possible lateral movement or first stage PrivEsc via delegation.
name: Suspicious Outbound Kerberos Connection
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"5156" AND DestPort:"88") AND (NOT (Application:(*\\lsass.exe OR *\\opera.exe OR *\\chrome.exe OR *\\firefox.exe))))
author: Ilyas Ochkov
oscd.community
